name: Dear Otome / Shall we date?
description:
Ninjas, vampires, wizards...and more! You’ll have no trouble finding a story that you’ll enjoy.

Experience a romance like no other, choose your own path, create your style, and find your happily ever after! Let the stories take your breath away...

●Ninja Shadow●
You join an order of ninjas, secretly taking the place of your fallen brother. One of the senior ninjas takes you under his wing. The more time you spend with him, the more he grows on you... As your trust for each other strengthens, you can’t help but see him as more than just your instructor. Will you keep your true identity a secret or tell him the truth?
The world of the ninja awaits you.

●Blood in Roses●
A castle sits on the veil between humanity and the dark world, home to the beautiful and cruel Vampires. One day, they bite you and take your blood. If you fail to find and drink evening dew from the Rose Garden within ten days, you will become one of them. Falling in love along the way, you search for the hidden Garden, and unlock the mysteries of the castle.

●LoveTangle●
The luxurious Lilac Court apartments in Kaleido City, home to the stars, is where you will start your new life. There, you get to know your many charming and handsome neighbors. Gradually, you find yourself caught in a bittersweet love triangle.
As your heart wavers, you will make your decision and choose your partner, together with whom you will pursue your dreams.

●Wizardess Heart●
You are a fledgling wizardess, using your inborn magical ability as a veterinarian in a small village in the Kingdom of Gedonelune. One day, you receive a letter from Gedonelune Royal Magic Academy, the most prestigious magic academy in the land. Pass the trial to enroll in the academy with the help of your Buddy, your fate-bound partner.

●Lost Alice●
""You weren't following the White Rabbit, nor the call of the Queen of Hearts. You've come to Wonderland of your own will.""
The key to solving the mystery lies in your lost memories.
""My Alice, I've been waiting for you for so long.""
""I told you, I'm not Alice!""
You remember nothing but your name. They call you Alice. An elegant tea party with the Mad Hatter. Temptations from the Cheshire Cat. A golden afternoon with Joker. Your days in Wonderland will entertain you... and lead you to your true love.
Whose ""Alice"" will you be?

●Guard me, Sherlock!●
You visit the office of the world's greatest detective, Sherlock Holmes, with an unusual request. You meet a colorful cast of charming men, and get caught up in their misadventures. Crack the case and fall in love!

...PLUS more new stories and fun events every week!

Our apps are available for the following device models.

- iOS 8.0 or later

*Except for:
-iPad 2 (2nd generation / First Release March 2011)
-iPhone 4S (First Release October 2011)
